name: zotero-file-hierarchy
description: Export files according to collection organisation

scripts.start: tsc --target ES2017 --moduleResolution node 'File Hierarchy.ts' && node header.js
scripts.test: npm start && rm -rf 'My Library' && cp 'File Hierarchy.js'  ~/.BBTZ5TEST/zotero/translators/
scripts.push: npm start && git add . && git commit -m update && git push

author: Emiliano Heyns
